Package io.helidon.common.http

Class SetCookie

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.helidon.common.http.SetCookie

  • public class SetCookie
extends Object
    Represents 'Set-Cookie' header value specified by RFC6265.

    It is mutable and fluent builder.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      SetCookie​(String name, String value)
      Creates new instance.

      SetCookie path​(String path)
      Sets Path parameter.
      SetCookie secure​(boolean secure)
      Sets Secure parameter.
      String toString​()
      Returns content of this instance as a 'Set-Cookie:' header value specified by RFC6265.
